#text=Now that winter is over , our planting season has begun .
#text=Last weekend , I went out and bought a small apple tree .
#text=I found a perfect spot in my back yard for it .
#text=First I looked around and decided even if it grew very large , it would n't run into any other trees or power lines .
#text=Next I got to work with my tiller , cutting into the earth and churning up the dirt .
#text=Once everything was loosened , I took my shovel and dig a hole .
#text=I gently placed the small young tree into that spot , burying it 's roots in the hole I had dug .
#text=I added some coffee grounds to the soil around the roots , and then took my shovel and got to work covering the roots up again .
#text=Finally , I smoothed the dirt with my shovel and went to get my garden hose .
#text=Smiling , I admired the small but sturdy tree in my yard that will someday be a large tree that gives us fruit .
